ValidationRule.description: Fields cannot be edited if payment is cleared.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(loan__Loan_Snapshot__c)) , $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",
OR( ISCHANGED( loan__Clearing_Date__c), ISCHANGED( loan__Transaction_Amount__c ), ISCHANGED(loan__Principal__c ), ISCHANGED( loan__Interest__c ), ISCHANGED( loan__Fees__c), ISCHANGED( loan__Excess__c ), ISCHANGED( loan__Balance__c ), ISCHANGED( loan__Transaction_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( loan__Transaction_Time__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: One of the fields you modified cannot be edited after the payment has been Cleared.
